WELCOME.SUBTITLE: METAVERSE FOR CULTURIZATION IN MIRROR CLASSROOMS
WELCOME.DESCRIPCTION: Metadec is a virtual world focused on the virtual internationalization of students at the University of Cundinamarca, this virtual space will be open to any student registered in the institution and from international universities in agreement that is part of a mirror classroom class in order to give them the opportunity to speak naturally about their culture.
WELCOME.CANCHAS: The sports-themed activity is located on the soccer field outside the university.
WELCOME.BIENESTAR: The chess-themed activity is located in the wellness room located in the administrative area.
WELCOME.RESTAURANT: The coffee-themed activity will be located in the restaurant found on the third floor.

NETIQUETA.TITLE: SOCIALLY ACCEPTABLE STANDARDS OF CONDUCT AT METADEC

LOGIN.TITLE: LOGIN
LOGIN.PASSVALIDATIONFORMAT: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters, one digit, one special character, one uppercase and one lowercase.

REGISTER.TITLE: REGISTER
REGISTER.PASSVALIDATIONFORMAT: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters, one digit, one special character, one uppercase and one lowercase.
REGISTER.NAME: Name
REGISTER.EMAILVALIDATIONFORMAT: Please enter a valid email address
REGISTER.POLICYVALIDATION: It is mandatory to accept the policy to register

SESSION.TITLE: CREATE MIRROR CLASSROOM SESSION
SESSION.DESCRIPTION: Add a maximum of 15 links to see in the virtual world of METADEC

DASHBOARD.TITLE: WELCOME
DASHBOARD.TITLECOUNTRY: COUNTRIES WITH WHICH YOU HAVE INTERACTED
DASHBOARD.SUBTITLECOUNTRY: 4 COUNTRIES WITH WHICH YOU HAVE CARRIED OUT THE GREATEST NUMBER OF SESSIONS
DASHBOARD.AXISY: Times of interaction with a native
DASHBOARD.SUBTITLEREPORT: You have an active report in your account

DASHBOARDSESSIONS.TITLE: SESSIONS
DASHBOARDSESSIONS.MINTITLE: Scheduled sessions ordered according to the closest date

CHANGEPASS.TITLE: CHANGE PASSWORD
CHANGEPASS.SUBTITLE: PASSWORD INFORMATION
CHANGEPASS.PASSVALIDATIONFORMAT: The password must have a minimum of 8 characters, one digit, one special character, one uppercase and one lowercase.

DASHADMIN.TITLE: REPORT
DASHADMIN.QUESTION: QUESTION
DASHADMIN.SUBQUESTION1: ¿THE EXPERIENCE OF NAVIGATING IN A METAVERSE IMPROVED THE RELATIONSHIP WITH STUDENTS WITHIN THE CLASSROOM?
DASHADMIN.SUBQUESTION2: ¿YOU WOULD LIKE TO RECEIVE MORE CLASSES WITHIN METADEC ADDITIONAL TO AULAS ESPEJO?
DASHADMIN.SUBQUESTION3: ¿CREATING AN AVATAR OF HIMSELF AND USING IT WITHIN METADEC ALLOWED FOR BETTER VIRTUAL COMMUNICATION?
DASHADMIN.SUBQUESTION4: ¿DIGITAL RESOURCES WITHIN THE VIRTUAL SPACE COMPLEMENTED THE SYNCHRONOUS SESSION?
DASHADMIN.SUBQUESTION5: ¿HOW DO YOU RATE THE GENERAL EXPERIENCE WITHIN METADEC?
DASHADMIN.LABEL: ANSWERS
